name: Traffic Impacts of Bicycle Facilities
purpose: Analyzed how different types of bicycle lanes affected how drivers behaved. Found that buffered or striped bicycle lanes increased the predictability of driver behavior
author: John Hourdos, Derek Lehrke, Melissa Duhn, Alireza Ermagun, Lila Singer-Berk, Greg Lindsey
image_description: Image of a two-way, one lane street with a center turn lane and buffered bike lanes on either side
